scripts.android-release-cap-build: if [ "$(uname)" = 'Darwin' ]; then run-s dev-android-prepare && source .env.macos-dev-android; fi && if [ -f .env.local ]; then source .env.local; fi && cap sync android && cap build android --keystorealias $ANDROID_KEYSTOREALIAS --keystorealiaspass $ANDROID_KEYSTOREALIASPASS --keystorepath $ANDROID_KEYSTOREPATH --keystorepass $ANDROID_KEYSTOREPASS
scripts.android-release-aab-to-apk: if [ -f .env.local ]; then source .env.local; fi && cd android/app/build/outputs/bundle/$(echo $NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_FLAVOR)Release/ && pwd && rm -f app-$NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_FLAVOR-release-signed.apks && $([ -x "$(command -v bundletool)" ] && echo bundletool || echo $BUNDLETOOL) build-apks --mode universal --bundle app-$NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_FLAVOR-release-signed.aab --output app-$NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_FLAVOR-release-signed.apks --ks $ANDROID_KEYSTOREPATH --key-pass pass:$ANDROID_KEYSTOREALIASPASS --ks-key-alias $ANDROID_KEYSTOREALIAS --ks-pass pass:$ANDROID_KEYSTOREPASS && unzip -o app-$NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_FLAVOR-release-signed.apks && mv universal.apk app-$NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_FLAVOR-release-signed.apk
scripts.capacitor-assets-generate-android: cp assets/logo-android.svg assets/logo.svg && capacitor-assets generate --android --iconBackgroundColor '#000000' --iconBackgroundColorDark '#000000' --splashBackgroundColor '#FFC41F' --splashBackgroundColorDark '#FFC41F' && rm assets/logo.svg
scripts.capacitor-assets-generate-ios: cp assets/logo-ios.png assets/logo.png && capacitor-assets generate --ios --iconBackgroundColor '#FFC41F' --iconBackgroundColorDark '#FFC41F' --splashBackgroundColor '#FFC41F' --splashBackgroundColorDark '#FFC41F' && rm assets/logo.png
scripts.dev: npm-run-all -l -s package-changed -p dev-remove-webpack-cache-if-stale graphql-codegen -p graphql-codegen-watch dev-next-dev < /dev/null
scripts.dev-android-build-googlePlay-export-run: NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_FLAVOR=googlePlay npm-run-all -l -s package-changed -p dev-remove-webpack-cache-if-stale graphql-codegen -s next-build-export dev-android-run
scripts.dev-android-build-independent-export-run: NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_FLAVOR=independent npm-run-all -l -s package-changed -p dev-remove-webpack-cache-if-stale graphql-codegen -s next-build-export dev-android-run
scripts.dev-android-prepare-openjdk: if [ ! -d "$(brew --prefix)/opt/openjdk@17" ]; then brew install openjdk@17; fi
scripts.dev-android-prepare-sdk: source .env.macos-dev-android && [[ $(sdkmanager --list_installed | grep -c 'build-tools;33.0.1\|platforms/android-33') != '2' ]] && echo 'Installing required Android build tools and SDK:' && sdkmanager 'build-tools;33.0.1' 'platforms;android-33' || true
scripts.dev-android-release-build: npm-run-all -l -p dev-android-prepare dev-remove-webpack-cache-if-stale -s next-build-export android-release-cap-build android-release-aab-to-apk
scripts.dev-android-release-install-run: source .env.macos-dev-android && adb kill-server && adb install -r --user 0 android/app/build/outputs/bundle/$(echo $NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_FLAVOR)Release/app-$NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_FLAVOR-release-signed.apk && adb shell am start -n com.gershad.gershad/com.gershad.gershad.$([ $NEXT_PUBLIC_ANDROID_FLAVOR = independent ] && echo 'Independent' || echo 'GooglePlay' )MainActivity
scripts.dev-android-run: run-s dev-android-prepare && source .env.macos-dev-android && adb kill-server && source .env.local && cap run android --target=$CAPACITOR_ANDROID_TARGET_DEVICE_ID
scripts.dev-android-run-dev: run-s dev-android-prepare && source .env.macos-dev-android && adb kill-server && source .env.local && CAPACITOR_ENABLE_DEV_SERVER=true cap run android --target=$CAPACITOR_ANDROID_TARGET_DEVICE_ID
scripts.dev-ios-build-export-run: npm-run-all -l -s package-changed -p dev-remove-webpack-cache-if-stale graphql-codegen dev-ios-prepare -s next-build-export dev-ios-run
scripts.dev-ios-run: run-s dev-ios-prepare && source .env.local && cap run ios --target=$CAPACITOR_IOS_TARGET_DEVICE_ID
scripts.dev-ios-run-dev: run-s dev-ios-prepare && source .env.local && CAPACITOR_ENABLE_DEV_SERVER=true cap run ios --target=$CAPACITOR_IOS_TARGET_DEVICE_ID
scripts.dev-build-export-serve: npm-run-all -l -s package-changed -p dev-remove-webpack-cache-if-stale graphql-codegen -s next-build-export dev-serve
scripts.dev-lint-test: npm-run-all -l -s package-changed -p eslint-check jest prettier-check typescript-check
scripts.test-next-build-export: dotenv -oe .env.test -- next build && next export -o out-test
